article_title: State of the State: Haslam doubles down on education

article_metadata.description: Tennessee Gov. Bill Haslam unveiled a $34.8 billion budget Monday that calls for investing $261 million in new money for K-12 education in areas ranging from teacher pay to adding a 12th month of state funding for teacher health insurance.
